mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE user_email = #{email} AND user_password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (user_id,user_password,user_name,user_email, user_phone, user_address, user_gender, user_lifestyle, user_interest, user_food_favor, user_access_time) VALUES (member_seq.nextval,#{password},#{name},#{email},#{phone},#{address},#{gender},#{user_lifestyle},#{user_interest},#{user_food_favor},to_date(sysdate,'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi:SS'))
mapper.select: select m.user_id,l.gender,l.livealone,l.child, l.worker,l.couple,l.homemaker,l.baby, i.pet,i.outdoor,i.health,i.baking,i.cooking,i.babycare,f.sweetness,f.bitter,f.sour_taste,f.salty,f.spicy from member m, lifestyle l, interest i, food_favor f where m.user_lifestyle = l.lifestyle_id and m.user_interest=i.interest_id and m.user_food_favor=f.food_favor_id
